title: [BUG] Support Mastery (Bandit)
body:
As of a patch from a while ago, Bandit was remade to give melee champions +8g on hit, rather than +15 on assist(/kill) and when you do hit someone in-game you can see that in your buff bar it says that 3 gold has been stolen rather of 8 gold. Nothing major but a bug nonetheless.
Can be recreated by hitting a champion as a melee champion with this mastery.
